1:
--------------------
Text: Ekstra Weekend:  The show aired on Friday nights between 7 and 10 pm.
Triplets:<Ekstra Weekend
2:
--------------------
Text: Ekstra Weekend:  The show was hosted by Gerard Ekdom and Michiel Veenstra.
Triplets:<Ekstra Weekend
3:
--------------------
Text: Ekstra Weekend:  The name "Ekstra Weekend" is a contraction of the last names of the two hosts.
Triplets:<Ekstra Weekend
4:
--------------------
Text: Ekstra Weekend:  When one of the two was absent, he was replaced by Domien Verschuuren, nicknamed Iemand Anders (someone else), who used to be the producer of the show until Tjitse Leemhuis took his role.
Triplets:<Ekstra Weekend

ere are the extracted triplets:

7:
--------------------
<Text: Ekstra Weekend:  Rob Stenders, Paul Rabbering and Bart Arens have all been substitute DJs.>
Triplets:<Ekstra Weekend
9:
--------------------
<Text: Ekstra Weekend:  Producer Tjitse Leemhuis (a.k.a. Tjibbe Tjibsma) was also part of the show.>
Triplets:<Tjitse Leemhuis
